text.name: Set of 4 Egyptian Cotton Bath Towels
text.desc: <p>Having a terrible towel is totally fine when you're a student because, well, it's probably character building and students don't appreciate the finer things anyway. Once you graduate though and get your own place, terrible towels are unforgivable. Be an adult, go Egyptian. Get this set worth &pound;39.99 for just &pound;16.99.</p> <p>This four set of bath towels are 100% super soft cotton that will make you feel like one of those cherubs out of Fantasia. The towels are 600g per square metre of divineness (which is definitely a word) and you'll want to walk around in them all the time. Hang the towels up after use though - dumping them on the bathroom floor will only make the cat think you've bought it a new bed. </p> <p>Choose between blueberry, white, cream, truffle, cobalt and steel and you'll be lounging in luxury in no time. This is also the perfect time of year to invest in some luxury towels because stepping out of the shower into the cold is such a traumatic experience you end up having a much longer shower to put it off and waste so much water. The towels are available in the following colours:</p> <p><ul> <li>Blueberry</li> <li>White</li> <li>Cream</li> <li>Cobalt</li> <li>Truffle</li> <li>Steel</li> </ul></p> <p>You can pick a colour after purchasing your voucher. Click 'Buy Now' and rest in the knowledge that when you get out of your steamy shower you can wrap up in a deep, soft Egyptian cotton towel. Mmmm.</p>
text.spec: <ul class="bulletList"> <li>58% off a Egyptian cotton towel set worth &pound;39.99, now &pound;16.99</li> <li>Choose from six colours</li> <li>600 GSM and 100% pure cotton</li> <li>Deliciously soft</li> <li>Give your bathroom a touch of luxury</li> </ul>

text.name: Monaco Grand Prix Day Ticket and Accommodation
text.desc: <p>Here's something to really get Formula 1 fans excited - a trip to watch the Monaco Grand Prix in the flesh, with accommodation and flights included, now from &pound;299 per person. Soak up the thrilling atmosphere of the most glamorous race in the Formula 1 calendar, in a star-studded location, surrounded by breath-taking scenery.</p> <p>For <strong>£299 per person</strong> you can enjoy accommodation on Sunday night in the ACHOTEL Juan le Pins with breakfast and Rocher entry to the race. This option does not include flights or transfers, however you can pay a little extra for these luxuries!</p> <p>All the options below include a private executive day return charter flight with hot breakfast served on the outbound flight and dinner served on the return flight. You'll also get complimentary drinks, luxury coach transfers, host and management services throughout PLUS the following add-ons:</p> <p><ul> <li><strong>£599 per person:</strong> Sector Rocher tickets</li> <li><strong>£649 per person:</strong> Sector Rocher tickets, departure from Stansted private Inflite terminal which includes parking (one car per two people) and entry to the executive lounge with snacks, tea, coffee and newspapers for no extra cost</li> <li><strong>£699 per person:</strong> Sector Rocher tickets and BA flights from Glasgow - it is recommended that you book early for this option</li> <li><strong>£999 per person:</strong> Caf de Paris tickets with sumptuous three course meal and half bottle of wine whilst watching the race on giant screens </li> <li><strong>£999 per person:</strong> one night stay on Sat/Sun at the ACHOTEL Juan le Pins with breakfast and Rocher entry</li> <li><strong>£1099 per person:</strong> Grandstand T Cale d'Halange tickets for a more advantageous view of the race. A single supplement of £129 applies for this option.</li></ul></p> <p>Even if you're not a Formula 1 aficionado, you'll have heard of the Monaco Grand Prix. One of the world's most exciting races, it's been capturing the hearts of Formula 1 fans for over 80 years. This is your chance to be part of the action, without putting a massive dent in your bank balance, and enjoy a day filled with heart-stopping excitement on the streets of Monaco. Follow all those skilled drivers as they take on the ups and downs, tight corners and even a tunnel, as part of this legendary race.</p> <p>The glamorous reputation of the Monaco Grand Prix means it's been attracting famous faces for years, so you can indulge in a bit of celeb-spotting while the race unfolds. Check out the beautiful blue waters of the marina with its enormous yachts, and explore one of the world's most desirable locations as you climb the hill leading to the F1 admission area and further on, Grimaldi Castle, home to Monaco's royal family. After all the excitement ends, unwind in the comfort of the AC Hotel in beautiful Juan les Pins.</p> <p>If you thought Formula 1 was out of your price bracket, think again! Click 'Buy Now' to snap up this incredible deal and start packing that overnight bag!</p>
text.spec: <ul class="bulletList"> <li>A day trip to watch the Monaco Grand Prix, now from &pound;299</li> <li>Bed & breakfast accommodation at the AC Hotel in Juan les Pins</li> <li> Private executive day return charter flight and longer stay options available</li> <li>Entry to Monaco Grand Prix</li> <li>Experience all the thrills and spills of Formula 1 as it unfolds</li> <li>Watch the professionals take on one of the world's most demanding F1 tracks</li> </ul>

If that isn't enough, the city of Exeter is only 8 miles away, and the liberating stretches of Dartmoor are within easy reach.</p> <p>Click 'Buy Now' to bag your Mighty holiday deal.</p> <br> <div class="map"> <h3>Location</h3> <iframe width="568" height="450" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" src="http://maps.google.co.uk/maps?f=q&amp;source=s_q&amp;hl=en&amp;geocode=&amp;q=16+Douglas+Avenue,+Exmouth,+Exmouth+EX8+2EX&amp;aq=&amp;sll=53.436309,-1.40047&amp;sspn=0.18182,0.528374&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;hq=&amp;hnear=16+Douglas+Ave,+Exmouth+EX8+2EX,+United+Kingdom&amp;t=m&amp;ll=50.614454,-3.399582&amp;spn=0.024508,0.048666&amp;z=14&amp;iwloc=A&amp;output=embed"></iframe><br /><small><a href="http://maps.google.co.uk/maps?f=q&amp;source=embed&amp;hl=en&amp;geocode=&amp;q=16+Douglas+Avenue,+Exmouth,+Exmouth+EX8+2EX&amp;aq=&amp;sll=53.436309,-1.40047&amp;sspn=0.18182,0.528374&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;hq=&amp;hnear=16+Douglas+Ave,+Exmouth+EX8+2EX,+United+Kingdom&amp;t=m&amp;ll=50.614454,-3.399582&amp;spn=0.024508,0.048666&amp;z=14&amp;iwloc=A" style="color:#0000FF;text-align:left">View Larger Map</a></small><p><strong>Address:</strong> 16 Douglas Avenue, Exmouth, Exmouth EX8 2EX </p> </div>
